data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borlini, Paula V., Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano, Araujo, Lucimar S. (2018): Cispallidus Mellie, 1849: redescription, new synonym, geographic distribution, and host fungi records. ZooKeys 762: 117-129, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.762.23433, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.762.23433
